trans-unit.source: Defines column-specific properties that apply to <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Definisce le proprietà specifiche della colonna che si applicano agli elementi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> uses its own special structure, a <xref:System.Windows.GridLength>, to describe its width characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> utilizza la propria struttura speciale, un <xref:System.Windows.GridLength>, per descrivere le caratteristiche di larghezza.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLength> allows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> to support variable distribution of available space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLength> consente un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> per supportare la distribuzione variabile dello spazio disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the actual calculated width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta l'ampiezza calcolata effettiva di un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the actual calculated width in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta l'effettiva larghezza calcolata in DIP (device independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: This property is a calculated value that is based on other width inputs and the layout system.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è un valore calcolato che si basa su altri input di larghezza e il sistema di layout.

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elementi e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che rappresenta la larghezza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the maximum width.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta la larghezza massima.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values together in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizzano questi valori nello stesso esempio di codice, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth%2A> valore ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth%2A> valore, che a sua volta ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elementi e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> viene chiamato.
Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: Rappresentazione di stringa di un <xref:System.Double> valore maggiore o uguale a `0.0034` ma uguali o minori di `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Un valore non qualificato viene misurato in DIP (device independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Le stringhe non devono includere decimali in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto *doppie* valore come descritto in precedenza, (ad eccezione di `Auto`) seguito da uno degli identificatori di unità seguenti: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che rappresenta la larghezza minima di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the minimum width.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta la larghezza minima.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values together in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizzano questi valori nello stesso esempio di codice, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth%2A> valore ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth%2A> valore, che a sua volta ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns , the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elementi e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> viene chiamato.
Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: Rappresentazione di stringa di un <xref:System.Double> valore maggiore o uguale a `0.0034` ma uguali o minori di `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Un valore non qualificato viene misurato in DIP (device independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Le stringhe non devono includere decimali in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto *doppie* valore come descritto in precedenza, (ad eccezione di `Auto`) seguito da uno degli identificatori di unità seguenti: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the offset value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta il valore di offset di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the offset of the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta l'offset della colonna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" /> element, or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> value of a column that is defined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la larghezza calcolata di un elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" /> o imposta il valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> di una colonna definita da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> that represents the width of the Column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> che rappresenta la larghezza della colonna.

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elementi e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> viene chiamato.
